alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 9:34AM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, a light glaze of ice accumulation is possible through noon|. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected with a mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Iowa, Clinton County. In Illinois, Stephenson and Carroll Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
